info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:08PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Union County through 145 PM EDT... At 107 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Monroe, or near Waxhaw, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Unionville, Wesley Chapel, Wingate, Waxhaw, Lake Park, Mineral Springs, Hemby Bridge, Fairview In Union County and Indian Trail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
